Master Answer:
The DTaP-IPV-Hib (diphtheria, tetanus, pertussis, polio, Haemophilus influenzae type b) is a routine part of BC's immunization schedule, offered at the 18 month old visit. The routine BC immunization schedule is found here.  Any clinic providing routine vaccines to infants should have this vaccine in stock. The HealthlinkBC healthfile for this vaccine product is here.
Contact your local health unit to make an immunization appointment here.
Immunization Nurse
